alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued October 27 at 9:42AM MDT until October 27 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility below one quarter mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential ice on bridges and untreated surfaces. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Untreated roadways, especially in open country, may be glazed in ice. Please drive with caution.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
